description: A Drone plugin for caching current workspace files between builds to reduce your build times. `drone-cache` is a small CLI program, written in Go without any external OS dependencies (such as tar, etc).

filesystem-cache-route.description: local filesystem root directory for the filesystem cache.

path-style.description: use path style for bucket paths. (true for minio, false for aws).

example:
kind: pipeline
name: default

steps:
  - name: restore-cache
    image: meltwater/drone-cache:dev
    pull: true
    settings:
      access-key:
        from_secret: aws_access_key_id
      secret-key:
        from_secret: aws_secret_access_key
      restore: true
      bucket: drone-cache-bucket
      region: eu-west-1
      mount:
        - 'vendor'

  - name: build
    image: golang:1.11-alpine
    pull: true
    commands:
      - apk add --update make git
      - make drone-cache

  - name: rebuild-cache
    image: meltwater/drone-cache:dev
    pull: true
    settings:
      access-key:
        from_secret: aws_access_key_id
      secret-key:
        from_secret: aws_secret_access_key
      rebuild: true
      bucket: drone-cache-bucket
      region: eu-west-1
      mount:
        - 'vendor'
